code: search_ckan(search_term, ckan_url, rows = 10, detailed = FALSE, ...)  search_ckan_vic(search_term, ...)  search_ckan_nsw(search_term, ...)  search_ckan_aus(search_term, ...)  search_ckan_qld(search_term, ...)  search_ckan_sa(search_term, ...)  search_ckan_wa(search_term, ...)  search_ckan_nt(search_term, ...)
